Boughs of the World Tree.name: Boughs of the World Tree
Boughs of the World Tree.flavor: Gnarled branches burst from the battlefield, granting benefits to your allies and hindering your foes with twisting vines.
Boughs of the World Tree.effect:
You conjure boughs of the World Tree in five unoccupied squares in the burst that arenâ€™t adjacent to one another. The boughs last until the end of your next turn. The boughs are solid obstacles, and each square adjacent to them is difficult terrain for your enemies.
The boughs can be attacked. Each has resist 20 to all damage, and a bough is destroyed if it takes any damage.
When you use this power, choose one of the following benefits:
